name: lastday
story:
The Last Day is an shoot 'em up, developed and published by Dooyong, which was released in 1990.

The Last Day is 2D arcade vertical shoot'em up from South Korea. Gameplay in this title is pretty standard - the player controls a small plane and shoots various enemies, like planes, tanks, artillery or boats. He can use normal, upgradeable gun and limited smart bombs. Game uses several locations, like lakes, forest or cites - and some "special" monuments, like Statue of Liberty.
